tc_games.app_data:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16" standalone="yes"?> <values> <add key="d3b2aa93-7e2b-4e0d-8080-67d14b2fa8a9:VirtualDirectories" value="<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16"?>
<ArrayOfVirtualDirectorySecurity xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
 <VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 <PermissionMode>Basic</PermissionMode>
 <PermissionType>Root</PermissionType>
 <Permissions>ReadFile WriteFile DeleteFile RenameFile ListDirectory CreateDirectory DeleteDirectory RenameDirectory</Permissions>
 <ServerId>1</ServerId>
 <RootPhysicalPath>$[SubAdminFiles]</RootPhysicalPath>
 <VirtualDirectoryName>Sub Admin Files</VirtualDirectoryName>
 <AdditionalPermissions>
 <VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 <Filters>*.exe;*.dll;*.so;*.bat;*.sh;*.cmd;*.vbs;*.pif;*.scr;*.com</Filters>
 <PermissionMode>None</PermissionMode>
 <PermissionType>File</PermissionType>
 <Permissions>None</Permissions>
 <ServerId>0</ServerId>
 <DisableSymlinkCheck>false</DisableSymlinkCheck>
 </VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 </AdditionalPermissions>
 <DisableSymlinkCheck>false</DisableSymlinkCheck>
 </VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 <VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 <PermissionMode>Basic</PermissionMode>
 <PermissionType>Root</PermissionType>
 <Permissions>ReadFile WriteFile DeleteFile RenameFile ListDirectory CreateDirectory DeleteDirectory RenameDirectory</Permissions>
 <ServerId>2</ServerId>
 <RootPhysicalPath>$[ResellerFiles]</RootPhysicalPath>
 <VirtualDirectoryName>Reseller Files</VirtualDirectoryName>
 <AdditionalPermissions>
 <VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 <Filters>*.exe;*.dll;*.so;*.bat;*.sh;*.cmd;*.vbs;*.pif;*.scr;*.com</Filters>
 <PermissionMode>None</PermissionMode>
 <PermissionType>File</PermissionType>
 <Permissions>None</Permissions>
 <ServerId>0</ServerId>
 <DisableSymlinkCheck>false</DisableSymlinkCheck>
 </VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 </AdditionalPermissions>
 <DisableSymlinkCheck>false</DisableSymlinkCheck>
 </VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 <VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 <PermissionMode>Basic</PermissionMode>
 <PermissionType>Root</PermissionType>
 <Permissions>ReadFile WriteFile DeleteFile RenameFile ListDirectory CreateDirectory DeleteDirectory RenameDirectory</Permissions>
 <ServerId>3</ServerId>
 <RootPhysicalPath>$[UserFiles]</RootPhysicalPath>
 <VirtualDirectoryName>User Files</VirtualDirectoryName>
 <AdditionalPermissions>
 <VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 <Filters>*.exe;*.dll;*.so;*.bat;*.sh;*.cmd;*.vbs;*.pif;*.scr;*.com</Filters>
 <PermissionMode>None</PermissionMode>
 <PermissionType>File</PermissionType>
 <Permissions>None</Permissions>
 <ServerId>0</ServerId>
 <DisableSymlinkCheck>false</DisableSymlinkCheck>
 </VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 </AdditionalPermissions>
 <DisableSymlinkCheck>false</DisableSymlinkCheck>
 </VirtualDirectorySecurity>
</ArrayOfVirtualDirectorySecurity>" type="TCAdmin.SDK.VirtualFileSystem.VirtualDirectorySecurity[],TCAdmin.SDK" /> <add key="__TCA:CREATED_BY" value="3" type="System.Int32,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:CREATED_ON" value="2015-09-17 07:12:49" type="System.DateTime,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:V1_GAME_ID" value="" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:NOTES" value="beals tweaks 2019" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="d3b2aa93-7e2b-4e0d-8080-67d14b2fa8a9:FileManager" value="<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16"?>
<FileManagerConfig xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
 <ServerId>0</ServerId>
 <EditPatterns>
 <string>*.cfg</string>
 <string>*.txt</string>
 <string>*.ini</string>
 <string>*.json</string>
 </EditPatterns>
 <MaxEditSize>102400</MaxEditSize>
 <EnableDecompress>true</EnableDecompress>
 <EnableCompress>true</EnableCompress>
 <MaxCompressSize>52428800</MaxCompressSize>
 <EnableUpload>true</EnableUpload>
 <EnableDownload>true</EnableDownload>
 <DefaultFileName>custom.cfg</DefaultFileName>
 <WriteBom>false</WriteBom>
</FileManagerConfig>" type="TCAdmin.SDK.Web.FileManager.FileManagerConfig,TCAdmin.SDK.Web" /> <add key="__TCA:MODIFIED_BY" value="3" type="System.Int32,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:MODIFIED_ON" value="2019-02-09 18:09:41" type="System.DateTime,mscorlib" /> </values>

tc_game_config_files.template: server.hostname "$[HostName]" server.maxplayers "$[Service.Slots]" //Maximum amount of players allowed to connect to your server at a time. server.worldsize "![WorldSize]" //Defines the size of the map generated (min 1000, max 8000) server.saveinterval "600" // Time in seconds for server save. server.entityrate "16" // Tickrate. Recommended to leave it at 16. server.official "false" //Only whitelisted server by Facepunch can use this command (False) server.globalchat "true" //If set to false, only people within voice range can read each others messages. (True) server.stability "true" //If set to false, building blocks will have 100% stability no matter how high you build. (True) server.radiation "true" //Disables / enables server radioation (True) server.itemdespawn "180" //Time until an item despawn (180) craft.instant "true" //Enable or disable instant crafting (False) server.pve "false" //Enables // disables PvE mode (False) server.description "Welcome to a new rust server" server.headerimage "use a custom image" //Sets the server banner - picture must be 500x256 server.url "www.mywebsite.com" //Sets the servers 'Web page' server.secure "1" ai.npc_enable "true" hackablelockedcrate.decayseconds "7200" hackablelockedcrate.requiredhackseconds "900" ai.npc_alertness_drain_rate "0.1" ai.npc_alertness_zero_detection_mod "0.5" ai.npc_cover_compromised_cooldown "10" ai.npc_cover_path_vs_straight_dist_max_diff "2" ai.npc_cover_use_path_distance "True" ai.npc_door_trigger_size "1.5" ai.npc_families_no_hurt "True" ai.npc_max_junkpile_count "20" ai.npc_max_population_military_tunnels "3" ai.npc_patrol_point_cooldown "5" ai.npc_respawn_delay_max_military_tunnels "1920" ai.npc_respawn_delay_min_military_tunnels "480" ai.npc_spawn_per_tick_max_military_tunnels "1" ai.npc_spawn_per_tick_min_military_tunnels "1" ai.npc_speed_crouch_run "0.25" ai.npc_speed_crouch_walk "0.1" ai.npc_speed_run "0.4" ai.npc_speed_sprint "1" ai.npc_speed_walk "0.18" ai.npc_valid_aim_cone "0.8" ai.npc_junkpile_a_spawn_chance "0.5" ai.npc_junkpile_g_spawn_chance "0.5" server.eac "1" //Enables / disables Easy Anti Cheat (1) server.meleedamage "1" //Changes the melee damage in percent - 1 = 100, 0.5 = 50%, 0 = 0% (1) server.arrowdamage "1" //Changes the arrow damage in percent - 1 = 100, 0.5 = 50%, 0 = 0% (1) server.bulletdamage "1" //Changes the bullet damage in percent - 1 = 100, 0.5 = 50%, 0 = 0% (1) server.bleedingdamage "1" //Changes the bleeding damage in percent - 1 = 100, 0.5 = 50%, 0 = 0% (1) server.meleearmor "1" //Changes the scale of protection against melee damage from clothing and armor in percent - 1 = 100, 0.5 = 50%, 0 = 0% (1) server.arrowarmor "1" //Changes the scale of protection against arrow damage from clothing and armor in percent - 1 = 100, 0.5 = 50%, 0 = 0% (1) server.bulletarmor "1" // Changes the scale of protection against bullet damage from clothing and armor in percent - 1 = 100, 0.5 = 50%, 0 = 0% (1) server.bleedingarmor "1" //Changes the scale of protection against bleeding damage from clothing and armor in percent - 1 = 100, 0.5 = 50%, 0 = 0% (1) server.planttick "60" //Plants tick every x seconds. This is how many seconds between ticks. (60) server.planttickscale "1" //Setting this to 2 will make plants grow, fruit and die two times faster than normal. (1) server.respawnresetrange "50" //Distance from sleeping bag to reset other sleeping bags/beds. (50) server.combatlogsize "100" // The size of the combat log (100) server.idlekick "30" // Number of minutes until idle players are kicked (30) server.idlekickmode "0" // 0 = no idle kick, 1 = kick if server full, 2 = always kick (1) server.idlekickadmins "0" // 1 = admins can get idle kicked (0) construct.frameminutes "30"//How many minutes before a placed frame gets destroyed (30) airdrop.min_players "2" // minimum amounf of players to spawn an airdrop. server.pvp "true" // Turns pvp on and off sleepers.on "true" // Turns sleepers on or off truth.enforce "true" // Enable Vac with this or disable it server.clienttimeout "2" // Client time out debug.checktriggers "false"// Debug triggers (False) decay.debug "false" // Debugmode (False) decay.upkeep "false" decay.tick "600" // Larger amount increases the applied decay damage to entity. (600) decay.scale "0.5" // 1 = normal decay, 0,5 = 50%, 0 = turn decay off (1) decay.bracket_0_blockcount "15" //Between 0 and this value are considered bracket 0 and will cost bracket_0_costfraction per upkeep period to maintain decay.bracket_0_costfraction "0.1" //Blocks within bracket 0 will cost this fraction per upkeep period to maintain decay.bracket_1_blockcount "50" //Between bracket_0_blockcount and this value are considered bracket 1 and will cost bracket_1_costfraction per upkeep period to maintain decay.bracket_1_costfraction "0.15" //Blocks within bracket 1 will cost this fraction per upkeep period to maintain decay.bracket_2_blockcount "125" //Between bracket_1_blockcount and this value are considered bracket 2 and will cost bracket_2_costfraction per upkeep period to maintain decay.bracket_2_costfraction "0.2" //Blocks within bracket 2 will cost this fraction per upkeep period to maintain decay.bracket_3_blockcount "200" //Between bracket_2_blockcount and this value (and beyond) are considered bracket 3 and will cost bracket_3_costfraction per upkeep period to maintain decay.bracket_3_costfraction "0.333" //Blocks within bracket 3 will cost this fraction per upkeep period to maintain decay.delay_metal "1" //How long should this building grade decay be delayed when not protected by upkeep, in hours decay.delay_override "0" //When set to a value above 0 everything will decay with this delay decay.delay_stone "1" //How long should this building grade decay be delayed when not protected by upkeep, in hours decay.delay_toptier "1" //How long should this building grade decay be delayed when not protected by upkeep, in hours decay.delay_twig "1" //How long should this building grade decay be delayed when not protected by upkeep, in hours decay.delay_wood "1" //How long should this building grade decay be delayed when not protected by upkeep, in hours decay.duration_metal "8" //How long should this building grade take to decay when not protected by upkeep, in hours decay.duration_override "0" //When set to a value above 0 everything will decay with this duration decay.duration_stone "5" //How long should this building grade take to decay when not protected by upkeep, in hours decay.duration_toptier "12" //How long should this building grade take to decay when not protected by upkeep, in hours decay.duration_twig "1" //How long should this building grade take to decay when not protected by upkeep, in hours decay.duration_wood "3" //How long should this building grade take to decay when not protected by upkeep, in hours decay.outside_test_range "30" //Maximum distance to test to see if a structure is outside, higher values are slower but accurate for huge buildings decay.upkeep_heal_scale "1" //Scale at which objects heal when upkeep conditions are met, default of 1 is same rate at which they decay decay.upkeep_inside_decay_scale "0.1" //Scale at which objects decay when they are inside, default of 0.1 decay.upkeep_period_minutes "18000" //How many minutes does the upkeep cost last? 1440 = 24 Hours env.timescale "0.0066666667" // time sacle env.time "8" // Shows in-game time. If value declared, will change the server time (values: 0 - 24) env.day "1" //Displays the day of the month. Pointless to change this value (12) env.month "6" //Displays the month. Pointless to change this value (6) env.year "2024" //Displays the year. Pointless to change this value (2024) bradley.enabled "1" // If set to false (0) it will disable the APC. Default is (1) heli.lifetimeminutes "15" //The amount of time the helicopter is allowed to stay in minutes. (15) heli.guns "1" // Enables / disables the helicopters minigun. If set to 0, the helicopter will shoot rockets only. (1) heli.bulletdamagescale "1" //Changes the bullet damage of the helicopter. Higher value = more damage (1) heli.bulletaccuracy "2" //Changes the accuracy of the bullets. Higher value = less accuracy (2) chat.enabled "true" //Enable or disable chat displaying (True) chat.serverlog "false" //Enable or disable chat logging (True) sentry.targetall "false" //Target everyone regardless of authorization (False) sentry.hostileduration "10" //How long until something is considered hostile after it attacked (120) construct.frameminutes "30" //How many minutes before a placed frame gets destroyed (30) ai.think "true" //If set to False, bears and wolfs are only hostile on attack (True) ai.move "true" // If set to False, animals will stop moving (recommended for performance boost) (True) ai.sensetime "1" // It's no use to change this value (1) ai.tickrate "5" // Changes the tickrate of animals (5)

tc_game_scripts.description: Set priority to idle for first minute
tc_game_scripts.script_contents: echo timeout /t 1 > Normal_%Service_ServiceId%.bat echo wmic process where ProcessId="%Service_Pid%" call SetPriority "Idle" >> Normal_%Service_ServiceId%.bat echo timeout /t 60 >> Normal_%Service_ServiceId%.bat echo wmic process where ProcessId="%Service_Pid%" call SetPriority "Normal" >> Normal_%Service_ServiceId%.bat echo del %Service_RootDirectory%Normal_%Service_ServiceId%.bat >> Normal_%Service_ServiceId%.bat

tc_game_variables_config.item_config: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16" standalone="yes"?> <values> <add key="StartIndex" value="0" type="System.Double,mscorlib" /> <add key="Source" value="FileSystem" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="CustomList" value="" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="FileSystemFilterType" value="Files" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="FileSystemFilter" value="Bundles/maps/*.map" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="FileSystemExcludeFilter" value="" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="FileSystemIncludeSubDirectories" value="False" type="System.Boolean,mscorlib" /> <add key="FileSystemItemValue" value="FileNameNoExtension" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="FileSystemItemDisplay" value="FileNameNoExtension" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> </values>
